amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds made available in the Act from being used to implement or administer the National Animal Identification System.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds from being made available to implement or administer the National Animal Identification System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 34 - 389 (Roll no. 184).
